rationale: 'highly contagious H5N1 strain' uses 'highly contagious' as a technical term.
statement_text: Mexico will start vaccinating birds in high-risk areas this week to prevent the spread of the highly contagious H5N1 strain of bird flu in the country, authorities said on Tuesday.
